select * from board where grp=#{grp} order by id desc limit #{index},10
mapper.insert: insert into board (sabun, title, content, grp, writeday) values (#{sabun}, #{title}, #{content}, #{grp}, now())
mapper.select: select ceil(count(*)/10) from board where grp=#{grp}
